jobDescription: Drift is a series A, tech startup located in Seattle WA, who has raised over 10 million dollars to fund our vision for the future of energy and the smart grid. We believe this future is smarter, more efficient, cheaper, and greener. We’re already delivering some of that vision to our customers, and we’re hiring a data analyst/scientist to be part of Drift’s Research & Development (R&D;) team.  Our team relies on energy expertise, automation, data assets, and machine learning to keep energy costs down, gain efficiency and optimize real-time energy transactions so that both, customers and suppliers benefit.  This role’s primary purpose will be to use data to perform analysis, develop partnership proposals, and develop tools that can be used by others internally and externally. In a small part, this role will also work closely with R&D; data and research scientists to develop machine learning algorithms in the energy sector. Drift is looking for someone who is a “go-getter”, rigorous, and hard working. As a Energy Data Analyst/Scientist, you will have make an impact in the company’s business decisions and the opportunity to learn and acquire different sets of skills. Come join us!
